report.title: Location termlist filter
report.description: Limit termlists displayed on page to the country selected by the user.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_termlists_terms ctt_allowed_terms_with_meanings JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt_allowed_terms on ctt_allowed_terms.meaning_id = ctt_allowed_terms_with_meanings.meaning_id AND ctt_allowed_terms.termlist_id in (#list_of_termlists_to_check#) #joins# WHERE ctt_allowed_terms_with_meanings.termlist_id in (#list_of_termlists_to_check#)

param.name: sample_country_attribute_id
param.description: Attribute that holds a sample's country selection (a termlists_term ID).

param.name: sample_id
param.description: Optionally limit page to terms associated with this sample's location.
param.join:
JOIN sample_attribute_values sav on sav.sample_id = #sample_id# AND sav.sample_attribute_id = #sample_country_attribute_id# AND sav.deleted = false -- Must take into account that a country's synonyms might have been used JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt_loc1 on ctt_loc1.id = sav.int_value JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt_loc_syn1 on ctt_loc_syn1.meaning_id = ctt_loc1.meaning_id
JOIN termlists_term_attribute_values ttav1 on ttav1.termlists_term_id = ctt_allowed_terms.id AND ttav1.termlists_term_attribute_id = #location_term_attribute_id# AND ttav1.int_value = ctt_loc_syn1.id AND ttav1.deleted = false

param.name: location_termlist_and_species_filter
param.description: Limit page to terms associated with this location if sample_id not present.
param.join:
-- Must take into account that a country's synonyms might have been used JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt_loc2 on ctt_loc2.id = #location_termlist_and_species_filter# JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt_loc_syn2 on ctt_loc_syn2.meaning_id = ctt_loc2.meaning_id
JOIN termlists_term_attribute_values ttav2 on ttav2.termlists_term_id = ctt_allowed_terms.id AND ttav2.termlists_term_attribute_id = #location_term_attribute_id# AND ttav2.int_value = ctt_loc_syn2.id AND ttav2.deleted = false

param.name: location_term_attribute_id
param.description: Attribute that holds the locations to limit page termlists to.

param.name: list_of_termlists_to_check
param.description: Comma separated list of IDs of termlist to check the language against. This should match the attributes on the page and helps to aid speed
